typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		article_id as string,
		description as string,
		guid as string,
		item as string,
		link as string,
		pubDate as string,
		source as string,
		sponsored as string,
		title as string,
		type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: false) ~> CosmosTransform
CosmosTransform sort(asc(source, true),
	asc(pubDate, true)) ~> SortByArticleID
